snippet.title: The Good Life - Steam Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The Good Life on Steam: 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/293340/

The Good Life is an intriguing combination of gameplay styles: part tycoon, part time-management, part simulation and 100% fun! Live the life you always dreamed of on your way to becoming the area top dog in this tropical sandbox game. 

Looking for more information on The Good Life? Check out the following channels:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thegoodlifegame
Twitter: http://twitter.com/Iceberg_Int #TheGoodLife
